title: Charging starts and suddenly stops, starts again, and stops
content:
I think after the last update my pixel does not charge correctly.

Problem is that if I plug in a cable then it starts charging and then stops, starts again, and stops and this cycle is repeating each second. I have to sometimes wait and it's fixed by itself but it's really annoying me.

I tried different chargers, different outlets and nothing helped. 

Don't you have a similar problem?
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 3a XL
